title: Gluten and Dairy Free Pear Fairy Cakes
ingredients: ["100g gluten free flour (e.g. Dove's Farm brand)", '50g soft brown Sugar', '4 tablespoons sunflower oil', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '1 teaspoon gluten free baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 pear, peeled and grated']
